titleStmt.title: The orders for ecclesiasticall discipline. According to that which hath been practised since the reformation of the church in his Majesties dominions by the auncient ministers, elders, and deacons of the isles of Garnsey, Gersey, Spark, and Alderny. Confirmed by the the authority of the synode of the foresaid iles.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
